definition[0]: if a company or organization downsizes, it reduces the number of people it employs in order to reduce costs
example[0]: The airline has downsized its workforce by 30%.
definition[1]: if a company downsizes, it reduces the number of employees and levels of management that it has
example[1]: If your company downsizes and you are over 50, your working life may be over.
example[2]: We have cut expenses and downsized our operations so that we will be in a position to capitalize on a gradually improving market.
example[3]: This software is the perfect tool for resizing or downsizing pictures from a digital camera.
